alert.note: Alert for Moffat; Rio Blanco (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 2:57PM MDT until May 25 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Moffat County in northwestern Colorado... Northwestern Rio Blanco County in northwestern Colorado... * Until 330 PM MDT. * At 256 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rangely, or 46 miles southeast of Vernal, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rangely around 310 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 13 and 25. Colorado 64 between mile markers 12 and 37. Colorado 139 between mile markers 68 and 72. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
